ingredients: 1 teaspoon chile ancho powder or any mild chili powder
2 to 3 tablespoons of the brine from pickled jalapeños
4 cups chicken, cooked and shredded finely
*12 roasted and peeled Anaheim or New Mexico green peppers (I took a little help from the store and purchased them in a can, can't always find fresh here in central New York state!)
Olive oil for brushing corn tortillas
2 cups shredded cheese of choice (I used jack cheese)
